title: Netflix could start charging extra for sharing accounts between households
content:
If you share your Netflix account with someone who doesn’t live in the same house, Netflix could soon ask you to pay extra. The streaming platform will soon start testing this change in a few regions, and if the test is a success, you might have to shell out more money to add sub-accounts for
